title: New: We Can Swim – A House Built On Lies (ft. One Glove) or the less so opinion splitting, The Postal Service
body:
Colorado outfit **We Can Swim** impress on their debut track, _A House Built On Lies (ft._

_One Glove)_. Grounded by a the sort of beat that characterised much of **Owl City’s** critically controversial album (or the less so opinion splitting, The Postal Service), and a female vocal not too far from the sugary sweet perfection of an Ellie Goulding or a Little Boots. At its core, it’s pop music, combining just the right amounts of intrigue, and welcoming level of heartwarming honesty.
